seo.title: Home - Ã‰lisabeth Constantin | 3D Multiplane Painter
seo.description: Step inside the artistic universe of Ã‰lisabeth Constantin, a painter specialising in the unique multiplane 3D technique. Explore original artworks, paintings, and immersive creations.
seo.keywords: Elisabeth Constantin, painter, multiplane 3D, painting, contemporary art, art gallery, original artworks, 3D panel

discover.title: My universe
paragraphs: Art has fascinated me since childhood. Trained in Lyon, I have spent more than 25 years building a body of work rooted in gesture, colour, and close observation of reality.
In 2017 everything changed: I left traditional supports behind in favour of a transparent material â€” acrylic glass. I tamed it and turned it into a genuine field of experimentation.
Once layered, these transparent strata create a tridimensional image suspended in space.

Process and perception
The artwork becomes movement: it lives through the visitor's steps, through shadows, light, and transparency. Depending on the angle or lighting, lines shift, shapes appear or fade, and depth transforms.

The intention
My practice aims to go beyond a fixed image. Every piece questions perception: it is both surface and volume, a living, ever-changing painting. It cannot be read from a single viewpoint â€” it reveals itself through a dialogue with the gaze.
